holidays.title: Accelerate ACL Awareness Among Young Women Day
holidays.description: We’re raising awareness about A.C.L. injuries and how to prevent them from happening.

holidays.title: Bell Bottoms Day
holidays.description: We’re celebrating one of the oldest fashion trends so make sure you wear your bell bottoms.

holidays.title: First Contact Day
holidays.description: Trekkies unite! We celebrate all things “Star Trek” until we make ‘First Contact’ in 2063!

holidays.title: Go For Broke Day
holidays.description: Get ready to discover why National Go For Broke Day is such a significant day!

holidays.title: Gold Star Spouses Day
holidays.description: In remembrance of the lives and families of those that have been lost serving this country.

holidays.title: Hospital Admitting Clerks Day
holidays.description: It’s Hospital Admitting Clerks Day: a perfect day to give a little back and thank yours.

holidays.title: International Day of Conscience
holidays.description: Ever wondered what the true meaning of conscience is? Join us to learn more.

holidays.title: Laylatul Qadr
holidays.description: Learn why Muslims busy themselves in worship and seek repentance on this Ramadan night.

holidays.title: National Body Care Day
holidays.description: Increase your wellness quotient by dedicating this day to your overall health.

holidays.title: National Caramel Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate the gooey finger-licking caramel treat in style with us!

holidays.title: National Dandelion Day
holidays.description: Are you wondering what National Dandelion Day is about? Join us and explore this amazing flower.

holidays.title: National Flash Drive Day
holidays.description: Today, the tiny gadget, usually weighing less than an ounce, can hold more than 2 Terabytes.

holidays.title: National Nebraska Day
holidays.description: Get ready to take a road trip down to the Cornhusker State on National Nebraska Day!

holidays.title: National Peeps Day
holidays.description: Calling on all Peeps lovers with an incurable sweet tooth — let’s have a Peeps Fest!

holidays.title: National Raisin and Spice Bar Day
holidays.description: Prepare your appetite for the best tasty delights we have to offer.

holidays.title: National Self Care Day
holidays.description: National Self-Care Day is about putting ourselves first and celebrating all things that bring us happiness.

holidays.title: Poet in a Cupcake Day
holidays.description: It's time to whip up some delectable cupcakes featuring lyrics from our favorite poet.

holidays.title: Read a Road Map Day
holidays.description: The amazing capacity of a paper road map allows you to explore any territories.

holidays.title: Walk to Work Day
holidays.description: Experience the wonders of walking as we walk you through some amazing walking benefits.

holidays.title: Bette Davis’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Hollywood icon can rest in knowing she blazed the trail for present and future generations.

holidays.title: Blayke Busby’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this adorable 10-year-old big sister to five, life has amazing things in store.

holidays.title: Daniel Caesar’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s so much in store for this talented and soulful singer and songwriter.

holidays.title: Hunter Rowland’s Birthday
holidays.description: There’s a lot in store for this social media influencer’s career in content creation.

holidays.title: Lil Sasquatch’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this hilarious Twitter star and blogger, the world is an oyster.

holidays.title: Pharrell Williams’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us in learning from the best and most talented in the business of entertainment.
